pullRequest.title: Create utility for custom config setup in packaging tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit creates a shared withCustomConfig method that may be used by
any packaging test. The method will copy the config directory and
override the conf path appropriately depending on the distribution type.

commit.message:
Create utility for custom config setup in packaging tests

This commit creates a shared withCustomConfig method that may be used by
any packaging test. The method will copy the config directory and
override the conf path appropriately depending on the distribution type.

nodes.bodyText: The previous implementation of the withCustomConfig method in PackageTests.java used exception handling to ensure that the cleanup / restore steps where always carried out. I'm curious about why this method isn't doing that?

We probabaly don't want to move this interface, since it's only being used in this file, but a possible alternative home would be libs/core/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/common, since we already have CheckedFunction and CheckedRunnable in there.
I would appreciate adding Javadoc here.
